name: Masonry - 3D Brick Creativity
summary:
Masonry is the best brick building app you can find an iPhone or iPad!

Construct intricate 3D models out of nearly 5000 unique parts in an array of colors. Download instruction booklets for inspiration. Add steps to show how to build your model. Then take photos with your model and share them with your friends.

Masonry is best used on a 5.5 inch or larger display (Plus phones and iPads). Masonry uses the Ldraw parts library and is compatible with Ldraw models.
